Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Plasticin-B1 (PTC-B1; PBN2KF, DRP-PBN2, Gly-rich; natural AMPs; UCLL1; frog, amphibians, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: The GXXXG motif. The peptide is disordered in water but helical in the presence of membrane-mimicking agents (TFE, SDS, DPC, or lipids DMPC and DMPG). 3D structure was determined in TFE, SDS and DPC. It is mainly helical with the C-terminus disordered, more in DPC (Carlier L et al., 2015). Updated 12/2015.
Literature Information.Author: Vanhoye D, Bruston F, El Amri S, Ladram A, Amiche M, Nicolas P.2004
Literature Information.Title: Membrane association, electrostatic sequestration, and cytotoxicity of Gly-Leu-rich peptide orthologs with differing functions.
